title: Australian Government selects ICEYE for near real-time flood and bushfire data to strengthen disaster response
key_assets: ['Flood and Bushfire Insights products', 'Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite constellation', 'ArcGIS integration']
summary: ICEYE has been selected by the Australian Federal Government to supply near real-time flood and bushfire hazard data to strengthen disaster response capabilities across all states and territories. The agreement expands ICEYE's existing relationship with the government, leveraging its SAR satellite constellation to provide actionable intelligence for emergency management.
why_it_matters: This contract solidifies ICEYE's role as a critical provider of disaster response data, enhancing Australia's ability to manage and mitigate the impacts of extreme weather events. It also demonstrates the growing reliance on commercial space-based data for government disaster response and recovery efforts.
